mapper.sql: ts_code, trade_date, pre_close, pre_settle, `open`, high, low, `close`, settle, close_change, settle_change, deal_vol, deal_amount, hold_vol
mapper.insert: insert into ts_future_daily (ts_code, trade_date, pre_close, pre_settle, `open`, high, low, `close`, settle, close_change, settle_change, deal_vol, deal_amount, hold_vol, hold_change, create_time) values (#{tsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preClose,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{preSettle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{open,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{high,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{low,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{close,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{closeChange,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settleChange,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealVol,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{holdVol,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{holdChange,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
